name: Fowl Ignition [Mini Jam 52]
description:
GOAL:

Blast your way to the SUMMIT of the tower to get Howard's cap back!

INSTRUCTIONS:
Use WASD to move around. When you move Howard will create an explosion boosting him towards the direction. The explosion can damage enemies so use it to your advantage! 

TIPS:
Howard's magic is limited so pay attention to the blue orbs!
When Howard's magic is LOW the orbs will disappear!
To GAIN MAGIC, Wreck enemies
Falling off the screen will result in a GAME OVER
Once you reach 100 percent, you will fight the boss!

NOTE:

The Jam Edition may contain MANY BUGS. I did the best I can and fixed all that came up but there may be a few that I didn't catch. If you do encounter a bug please let me know so I can make a fix for the post jam version!

There is also music in the game but it broke last minute! I will submit a fix later!
